Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

I'm Dhafeuwst, 29, I live in Paris (France). I'm a system engineer, had a few jobs in aeronautics bet never dealt with hard science/design problems like you do in KSP, so the game is for me a manner of getting introduced to some notions. I also love to solve some simple physics problems, to optimize things, and imagine futuristic crafts. The bigger/futuristic/overpowered, the merrier. It seems like KSP was made for me then ! I've purchased the game a couple days ago, played for a few of hours, gotten familiarized with the tutorials and some simple manoeuvers, and successfully launched a probe and a landing mission on MÃƒÂ¼n. Next I will try to make a few planes and eventually an SSTO spaceplane.

I've been lurking this forum for some time now, and learnt tons of useful information. Many thanks to all the tutorials contributors, you're my heroes guys !

Since I have so many questions, I decided to register and say hi. I will post them in the appropriate section.

See you there !

Welcome!

Sounds like you will enjoy it here.
Welcome to the KSP Forums! Enjoy your stay!
